meanings.definition: Neat, trim, smart, or elegant in appearance.
meanings.sent1: She always looks the spruciest in her neat uniform.
meanings.sent2: The garden gnome was the spruciest decoration in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The spruciest cat in the neighborhood always had perfectly groomed fur.
meanings.sent4: Among the trees, the spruciest pine stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: Her spruciest outfit made her stand out at the party.

meanings.sent1: He won the award for being the spruciest at the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The spruciest of all the trees in the forest was the majestic spruce.
meanings.sent3: The spruciest of the group, he always made sure his appearance was top-notch.
meanings.sent4: In the land of trees, the spruciest one reigned supreme.
meanings.sent5: The spruciest tree in the garden was a sight to behold.
